TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DataSourceSelectArguments extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供一項機制，讓資料繫結控制項於擷取資料時，用來向資料來源控制項要求資料相關的作業。

span.span: Provides a mechanism that data-bound controls use to request data-related operations from data source controls when data is retrieved.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料繫結控制項使用類別來要求資料來源控制項執行結果集，例如排序資料，或傳回特定資料子集上的其他資料相關作業。Data-bound controls use the class to request that a data source control performs additional data-related operations on a result set, such as sorting the data or returning a specific subset of data. 這些資料相關作業列舉的列舉型別。These data-related operations are enumerated by the enumeration. 下表指出如何類別支援這些資料相關的作業。The following table indicates how the class supports these data-related operations. |功能Capability|相關的 DataSourceSelectArguments 屬性Related DataSourceSelectArguments properties| |----------------|--------------------------------------------------| ||| ||, , | ||, , | 資料繫結控制項明確呼叫繫結資料，呼叫方法它們相關聯資料來源控制項的方法。Data-bound controls explicitly call the method to bind data, which calls the method of the data source control they are associated with. 如此一來，資料繫結控制項，請從資料來源控制項，視擷取資料。In this way, the data-bound control retrieves data from the data source control on demand. 因為方法會接受參數，資料繫結控制項負責建立和管理物件並將其傳遞至方法從資料來源控制項擷取資料時。Because the method accepts a parameter, the data-bound control is responsible for creating and managing a object and passing it to the method when it retrieves data from the data source control. 在某些情況下，資料繫結控制項可能不需要任何額外的資料相關功能。In some cases, data-bound controls might not need any additional data-related capabilities. 在此情況下，將資料繫結控制項傳遞引數物件至方法。In this case, data-bound controls pass an arguments object to the method. 資料繫結控制項的已排序的結果集，檢查資料來源檢視的屬性在執行階段及加入功能使用方法。For sorted result sets, data-bound controls check a data source view's property at run time, and add a capability using the method. 資料繫結控制項可以為個別的作業，要求排序的結果集從資料來源控制項，藉由設定屬性物件傳遞至方法。As a separate operation, the data-bound control can request a sorted result set from a data source control by setting the property on the object passed to the method. 資料繫結控制項分頁的情況下，檢查資料來源檢視的屬性在執行階段及加入功能使用方法。For paging scenarios, data-bound controls check a data source view's property at run time, and add a capability using the method. 為個別的作業，資料繫結控制項可以要求資料的子集用於分頁的資料來源控制項的設定和屬性物件傳遞至方法。As a separate operation, the data-bound control can request a subset of data from a data source control for paging by setting the and properties on the object passed to the method. 若要擷取分頁案例總計資料列計數，資料繫結控制項檢查資料來源檢視的屬性在執行階段及加入功能使用方法。To retrieve a total row count for paging scenarios, data-bound controls check a data source view's property at run time, and add a capability using the method. 為個別的作業，資料繫結控制項可以要求總計資料列計數分頁的資料來源控制項的設定屬性物件傳遞至方法。As a separate operation, the data-bound control can request a total row count from a data source control for paging by setting the property on the object passed to the method. 當方法傳回時，所包含的總計資料列計數屬性。When the method returns, the total row count is contained by the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果任何一個設定的屬性，但目前繫結的資料來源控制項不支援要求的功能，擲回例外狀況時方法呼叫。If any of the properties are set, but the currently bound data source control does not support the requested capability, an exception is thrown when the method is called.

span.span: A sort expression that data source controls use to sort the result of a data retrieval operation before the result is returned to a caller.

summary.span: 使用指定的排序運算式，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified sort expression, starting position, and number of rows to return for paging scenarios.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AddSupportedCapabilities(valuetype System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities capabilities) cil managed

span.span: One of the values.

summary.span: 將一項功能加入至 執行個體，這項功能可用來比較支援的功能和要求的功能。

span.span: Adds one capability to the instance, which is used to compare supported capabilities and requested capabilities.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料來源控制項呼叫資料來源支援的每一項功能的方法。Data source controls call the method for each capability the data source supports. 新增功能後，呼叫方法會比較要求的功能對支援的功能 (由設定， ， ，和屬性)。After the capabilities are added, any call to the method compares the supported capabilities against the requested capabilities (represented by setting the , , , and properties). 例如，如果一項功能，例如不會加入但設定屬性，則方法會擲回例外狀況。For example, if a capability such as is not added but the property is set, the method throws a exception.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Empty As DataSourceSelectArguments

summary.span: 取得排序運算式設定為 的 物件。

span.span: Gets a object with the sort expression set to .
A object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回建立預設物件建構函式。The property returns a object created with the default constructor. 您可以使用屬性，當您想要呼叫沒有任何其他引數的資料來源檢視類別的方法。You can use the property when you want to call the method of a data source view class without any additional arguments.

span.span: if the specified is equal to the current instance; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別覆寫方法來測試使用的各種屬性的物件是否相等。The class overrides the method to test equality using the various properties of the objects. 如果， ， ， ，和屬性都是在值中，相等方法會傳回`true`。If the , , , , and properties are all equal in value, the method returns `true`.

Public Overrides Function GetHashCode () As Integer

The hash code for the type.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaximumRows { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示資料來源控制項為資料擷取作業傳回的資料列最大數目。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that represents the maximum number of data rows that a data source control returns for a data retrieval operation.

value.span: 資料來源為資料擷取資作業傳回的資料列最大數目。

span.span: The maximum number of data rows that a data source returns for a data retrieval operation.

value.span: 預設值為 0，表示傳回所有可能的資料列。

span.span: The default value is 0, which indicates that all possible data rows are returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性支援分頁的案例。The property supports paging scenarios. 資料繫結控制項，請檢查資料來源檢視的屬性在執行階段及加入功能使用方法如果檢視支援分頁。Data-bound controls check a data source view's property at run time, and add a capability using the method if the view supports paging. 如果資料繫結控制項無法加入功能，且分頁會設定的屬性上資料擷取作業時，傳遞到資料來源檢視物件可能會擲回例外狀況。If the data-bound control fails to add the capability, and the paging properties are set on a object passed to the data source view during a data retrieval operation, an exception might be thrown. 資料繫結控制項可以藉由設定用於分頁的資料來源控制項的中要求的資料子集和屬性物件傳遞至方法。The data-bound control can request a subset of data from a data source control for paging by setting the and properties on the object passed to the method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果任何一個設定的屬性，但目前繫結的資料來源控制項不支援要求的功能，擲回例外狀況時方法呼叫。If any of the properties are set, but the currently bound data source control does not support the requested capability, an exception is thrown when the method is called.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RaiseUnsupportedCapabilitiesError(class System.Web.UI.DataSourceView view) cil managed

param.name: view
param.span: 執行資料擷取作業的資料來源檢視。

span.span: The data source view that performs the data retrieval operation.

summary.span: 比較 作業要求的功能與指定資料來源檢視支援的功能。

span.span: Compares the capabilities requested for an operation against those that the specified data source view supports.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用於資料繫結控制項所比較的屬性所表示的其他要求的功能類別，例如可以排序或分頁結果集，與資料所支援的功能原始碼 檢視中。The method is used by data-bound controls to compare additional requested capabilities represented by the properties of the class, such as the ability to sort or page through a result set, with the capabilities supported by the data source view. 檢視會呼叫其本身方法中定義的每個可能功能列舉型別。The view calls its own method for each possible capability defined in the enumeration. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果任何一個設定的屬性，但目前繫結的資料來源控制項不支援要求的功能，擲回例外狀況時方法呼叫。If any of the properties are set, but the currently bound data source control does not support the requested capability, an exception is thrown when the method is called.

exception.span: 資料來源檢視不支援指定的資料來源功能。

span.span: The data source view does not support the data source capability specified.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool RetrieveTotalRowCount { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出資料擷取作業時資料來源控制項是否應該擷取所有資料列的計數。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a data source control should retrieve a count of all the data rows during a data retrieval operation.

value.span: 如果資料來源控制項應該擷取資料列總數，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the data source control should retrieve a total data row count; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性支援分頁的案例。The property supports paging scenarios. 將此屬性設定為`true`資料擷取作業期間，從資料來源控制項要求總計資料列計數。Set this property to `true` to request a total row count from the data source control during the data-retrieval operation. 請檢查屬性來判斷資料來源的檢視是否支援擷取資料列總數。Check the property to determine whether a data source view supports retrieving a total row count. 如果資料來源支援此功能，屬性由資料來源控制項的資料擷取作業過程中設定而且總計資料列計數會傳回在大部分做為值會傳回輸出參數中的屬性，方法。If the data source supports it, the property is set by the data source control during the course of a data retrieval operation and the total data row count is returned in the property, much as a value is returned in an output parameter of a method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果任何一個設定的屬性，但目前繫結的資料來源控制項不支援要求的功能，擲回例外狀況時方法呼叫。If any of the properties are set, but the currently bound data source control does not support the requested capability, an exception is thrown when the method is called.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SortExpression { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定運算式，資料來源檢視可用來排序 方法所擷取的資料。

span.span: Gets or sets an expression that the data source view uses to sort the data retrieved by the method.

value.span: 字串，資料來源檢視可用來排序 方法所擷取的資料。

span.span: A string that the data source view uses to sort data retrieved by the method.

value.span: 如果未設定排序運算式，則會傳回 。

span.span: is returned if sort expression has not been set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性支援排序的案例。The property supports sorting scenarios.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int StartRowIndex { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示資料擷取作業期間，於擷取資料列時，資料來源控制項應該使用的起始位置。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that represents the starting position the data source control should use when retrieving data rows during a data retrieval operation.

value.span: 資料來源控制項擷取資料的起始資料列位置。

span.span: The starting row position from which a data source control retrieves data.

value.span: 預設值為 0，表示起始位置是結果集的開頭。

span.span: The default value is 0, which indicates that the starting position is the beginning of the result set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性支援分頁的案例。The property supports paging scenarios. 資料繫結控制項，請檢查資料來源檢視的屬性在執行階段及加入功能使用方法如果檢視支援分頁。Data-bound controls check a data source view's property at run time, and add a capability using the method if the view supports paging. 如果資料繫結控制項無法加入功能，且分頁會設定的屬性上資料擷取作業時，傳遞到資料來源檢視物件可能會擲回例外狀況。If the data-bound control fails to add the capability, and the paging properties are set on a object passed to the data source view during a data retrieval operation, an exception might be thrown. 為個別的作業，資料繫結控制項可以要求的資料子集從資料來源控制項藉由設定和屬性物件傳遞至方法。As a separate operation, the data-bound control can request a subset of data from a data source control by setting the and properties on the object passed to the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int TotalRowCount { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定資料擷取作業時擷取的資料列數目。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of rows retrieved during a data retrieval operation.

value.span: 資料擷取作業時擷取的資料列總數。

span.span: The total number of data rows retrieved by the data retrieval operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性支援分頁的案例。The property supports paging scenarios. 資料來源和資料來源檢視的控制項如何擷取資料列總數的內部實作的不同。Data source and data source view controls differ in their internal implementation for how to retrieve total row counts. 請檢查屬性來判斷是否要檢視資料來源支援的資料擷取作業期間擷取資料列總數。Check the property to determine whether a data source view supports retrieving a total row count during a data-retrieval operation. 如果資料來源支援此功能，屬性由資料來源控制項的資料擷取作業過程中設定而且總計資料列計數會傳回在大部分做為值會傳回輸出參數中的屬性，方法。If the data source supports it, the property is set by the data source control during the course of a data-retrieval operation, and the total data row count is returned in the property, much as a value is returned in an output parameter of a method.
